task.title: How to divide numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions on how to use the divide function on the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To divide numbers, you must know what is division.
taskbody.result: The result from the division displays.
taskbody.example:
Let's say you want to divide 20 by 5. The equation will look like: 20 รท 5= 4. You enter 20. Press divide (รท). Enter 5. Press equals.
The result 4 appears on the screen.
